name: ChordWizard Song
summary: Learn about .SNGX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create an SNGX file, select File → Save Song or Save Song As.... To open an SNGX file, select File → Open Song....

SNGX files can be uploaded to the ChordWizard network and shared with other members. The SNGX file also allows you to protect your songs. You can disable copying and printing functions, block editing or saving capabilities, embed a link to your member profile on the ChordWizard network, and lock song credits.
NOTE: Songtrix is available in bronze, silver, and gold editions, which are designed for beginner, intermediate, and advanced users.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
